extensionDescription.message: A simple Firefox extension to help you stop using bad passwords.

confirmWarning.description: Confirm and dismiss the warning dialog.

breachCount.message: The password you just entered has been found in $1 data breaches. This password is not safe to use.

breachExplainer.message: This means attackers can easily find this password online and will often try to access accounts with it.
breachExplainer.description: Explain the result of appearing in a breach.

callToAction.message: If you are currently using this password, please change it immediately to protect yourself. For more information, visit Have I Been Pwned?
callToAction.description: Action required from the user after being shown the warning.

sessionSuppressNotice.message: This notice will not show again for the duration of this session to give you time to update this password.
sessionSuppressNotice.description: Remind the user they will not be shown this notice for the duration of their session.
